name: Homewood Suites by Hilton, Dallas-Frisco

reviews.text: Whenever anyone comes to visit us here in Texas I always recommend staying at the Homewood Suites in Frisco. It is very clean. The service is excellent. The free breakfast in the morning is really good and during the week there is also a light dinner served free of charge. You really can't beat that! The rooms are large and have nice sized kitchenettes. The location is great. Right in the same area as Target, Best Buy, the Frisco Convention Center, and a large mall. Close to two major highways as well. Best bet for your stay here in North Texas!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent one night last Friday, and arrived late. Our room on the 2nd floor was quiet and our bed was very comfortable with lots of pillows. It appears to be catered to business travelers as our king-bed room had a fridge, microwave, stove, pots & pans, and utensils for cooking & eating in the room. Vanity sink was outside the spacious bathroom, and they provided Neutrogena toiletries. Gym room was well equipped, and they also have a nice pool area. Free wifi works great in our room.
reviews.title: Homey & feels like a 5-star hotel

reviews.text: Complimentary breakfast was VERY GOOD for a hotel - their hot waffles and scrambled eggs were so flavorful that we wanted their recipes. Bacons & sausages, biscuits & gravy, cold cereals, fruits, etc were all included in their breakfast items. The breakfast area was cozy, and there are books you could read if you spend more time there. There are coffee/tea dispensers in the lobby which I believe are available 24 hours.
reviews.title: First Class

reviews.text: We would definitely stay there again when we are in the area. It feels homey and the employees appear to enjoy working there. It may not be a 5-star hotel but it certainly feels like one.
reviews.title: Finally a hotel that truly exceeds expectations

reviews.text: Girls night out for get together and retail therapy in Frisco.
reviews.title: Outstanding Choice at Resonable Price

reviews.text: We stayed here about one month after a house fire. WIth a two bedroom unit in a family of five, it worked out very well. The food at this facility is some of the best, for hotel food. If you''re visiting Frisco, I highly recommend this place. The units have a living room or 1 or 2 bedrooms. It had a kitchenette with a 4 person table, something rare in a suite hotel. It has on-site laundry facilities, which helped keep 3 kids' clothes clean. The hotel staff was very nice and polite, but I'm also sure staying here a month with 3 kids, we overstayed our welcome. The rooms are nice, clean, and new, and a walk to the mall and major shopping.
reviews.title: Breakfast and Dinner - Mon - Thu

reviews.text: Clean hotel. Comfortable bed. The one bedroom suite was perfect for a stay with our toddler! The complimentary popcorn was a nice perk. My husband thought the breakfast was awesome (I had to hurry off to work and missed out). Beautiful outdoor pool.
reviews.title: Perfect for families

reviews.text: We are locals and we'll definitely recommend Homewood Suites to our family who visit us!
reviews.title: Best experience in US till date!

reviews.text: Stayed in Homewood Suites for 2 weeks in Nov 2011. The hotel was just excellent, I couldn't really find any issues with the service or quality!
reviews.title: The WOW Factor!! Great Hotel/Staff/Food/Location/Services

reviews.text: I had a suite with separate living area and a fully functional kitchen. The hotel staff were very polite and helpful and nice. I was impressed by the standard of breakfast and evening dinner served (which is included in the room rate!).
reviews.title: Wow, Great/Hotel/Staff/Location

reviews.text: We chose this hotel for our Girls Night Out. This hotel is perfect. We booked the two bedroom suite. It was spacious enough for five of us, having a large living room and kitchen area. The suite was spotless. I truly love the Hilton beds. They are my favorite. The staff here is amazing. They bent over backwards to make sure that we had a nice stay.
reviews.title: It doesn't get any better than this!

reviews.text: This is really a beautiful hotel with a nice outdoor space out by the pool. The breakfast area is bright and cheerful as is the lobby area.
reviews.title: Great for a family

reviews.text: All of us had a great time here and we will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Restful & Relaxing

reviews.text: We have young kids and this hotel is tops! Customer service is great and the suites are so comfortable for all of us. My husband said when we got here..."don't let me forget that anytime we travel out of state we are staying at Homewood Suites". Enough said. We paid $94 (AAA rate) and it was worth every penny! Thanks Hilton!
reviews.title: Home suite home

reviews.text: Very clean, large room, SUPER comfy bed. Really enjoyed everything. Great location, way better than average breakfast, name brand bathroom amenities, super weekend rate. If you are planning a trip to Frisco this is the place to stay!
reviews.title: Incredible!

reviews.text: Stayed over thanksgiving weekend! One bedroom suite for me and the family (2 kids).
reviews.title: Great value! Awesome homewood!

reviews.text: Great value, pretty new hotel. Great location. Right next to a shopping center so location definitely works. You will have many choices around this area as to we're to stay. Almost all of the hotels are in the same price range and all look new so you can probably go with the best price.
reviews.title: Wonderful experience! Fantastic hotel!

reviews.text: Beds were comfortable, not amazing but very good for what you pay. As always a little place in the lobby to buy drinks or necessities you might of left at home.
reviews.title: Wonderful experience

reviews.text: Hd tv (2) in the room. That's a big plus for me!
reviews.title: Best place to stay in Frisco!

reviews.text: Staff was very attentive and I really enjoyed my days there. Have stayed at homewood about 3 times in the past 3 years and they never have disappointed me!
reviews.title: great overnight hotel

aka: Homewood Suites By Hilton, Dallas-Frisco Hotel
description: Situated just 2 miles from the Dallas North Tollway, the Homewood Suites by Hilton Dallas/Frisco hotel is close to a number of international corporations such as JC Penney, PepsiCo and McAfee. The hotel features 117 suites featuring a fully equipped kitchen and separate living area. Keep fit in the 24-hour fitness center or stay active in the outdoor exercise garden. Enjoy the hotel's outdoor pool or admire the waterfall features from poolside lounge chairs. Enjoy all the support you'll need in the hotel's business center and enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel. Host a business meeting for up to 14 people in the Executive Board Room or celebrate your special event in the Gallery Room with up to 50 guests. Complimentary amenities include a Suite Start hot breakfast daily, a Welcome Home Reception (Mon - Thur evenings), and shuttle service within a 5 mile radius.
